title: Artkal Fuse Beads 22000 Melty Beads with 4 Pegboards 100 Patterns 2 Tweezers 2 Ironing Paper
top_review: This fuse bead kit is awesome! I got this kit as a shared Christmas gift for my 7 and 10 year old. They both have used kits like this at afterschool programs and at friends‚Äô houses, but were really pumped to have their own set.The colors are vibrant and there are so many in the kit the kids will be able to make a ton of things. I also like that there are multiple pegboards with so many templates to choose from to have a guide on making things, but of course the kids can use their imagination to craft whatever they want.The case is prefect, keeping the colors separated, and making it easy to store or travel with. This craft kit is worth it!

customer_says: Customers find the fuse bead kit to be of good quality with lots of great colors and consider it good value for money. Moreover, they find it fun for kids, with one customer noting it allows children to use their imagination. However, the beads are much smaller than normal perlers, making them challenging to use, and customers report mixed experiences with melting - while some say they melt well, others find them too easy to melt. Additionally, the kit is difficult to handle and doesn't work well for projects.

HOW TO USE Put the beads to arrange the desired pattern on the peg board, cover with ironing paper and melt it. The most important thing is to ensure that when melting, the peg board is flat and the force is even. It should also not take too long to melt, as this will lead to excessive melting, which will ruin your creation

If I had beanLooking for small beads, these would be perfect.

customer_says: Customers find the bead kit to be of great quality with a good color variety, including two bonus bags of black-and-white colors, and appreciate that it keeps them entertained for hours. The kit offers a wide variety of patterns to choose from, and customers consider it well worth the price as a fun gift for kids, particularly those above 5 years old. While some customers find the beads durable, others report issues with the case breaking. The size receives mixed feedback, with several customers noting the beads are smaller than expected.

description: About this item THIS ITEM IS NOT INTENDED FOR USE BY CHILDREN 12 AND UNDER. Complete 24,000 Mini Fuse Beads Kit with Full Accessories for Endless Craft Possibilities- Dive into creative expression with this extensive 24,000 mini fuse beads kit, designed for both beginners and experienced crafters. The kit includes 48 vibrant colors of tiny 2.6mm beads, perfectly presorted for easy access and precision. Whether you‚Äôre working on intricate bead art, fun bead pets, or detailed pixel art kit projects, you‚Äôll have every shade you need to bring your designs to life. The included 5 pegboards - 4 square and 1 round offer versatile platforms to craft everything from small charms to elaborate bead creations. Premium Fuse Beads Pegboards for Precision and Stability in Every Creation- Experience a superior crafting foundation with our high-quality fuse beads pegboards included in this comprehensive kit. The 4 big square pegboards (5.5‚Äù x 5.5‚Äù) and 1 large round pegboard (5.9‚Äù diameter) provide ample space for detailed designs, from complex pixel art to playful bead pets. Each pegboard is meticulously designed to hold the tiny 2.6mm fuse beads securely, preventing slippage and ensuring even patterns as you build your artwork. Ideal for both adults and older children, these pegboards make it simple to create sophisticated melting beads designs with confidence and accuracy. Vibrant 48-Color Mini Beads Selection for Unique Melting Beads Designs- Bring your artistic visions to life with the stunning range of 48 presorted colors in this fuse beads kit. Each 2.6mm bead is crafted to deliver consistent size and vibrant color, ensuring your bead art shines with professional-quality results. Whether you're crafting realistic bead pets, exploring the world of pixel art kit designs, or creating personalized iron beads projects, the extensive color variety allows for exceptional detail and shading. The bulk storage box keeps all 24,000 beads organized and easily accessible, making it simple to select the perfect hue for any design. Perfect Gift for Crafters and DIY Enthusiasts Seeking Bead Art Inspiration- Packaged in a stylish gift box, this mini fuse beads kit makes an ideal present for craft lovers, hobbyists, and DIY enthusiasts. The extensive selection of 24,000 beads, precision tools, and multiple pegboards offers endless possibilities for creating personalized gifts, home decor, or therapeutic art sessions. Whether you're introducing someone to the world of melty beads or enhancing an experienced crafter's collection, this comprehensive pixel art kit inspires creativity across all skill levels. his fuse beads kit comes complete with professional-grade tools to ensure every step of your creative process is smooth and enjoyable. The two metal tweezers allow for easy handling of the tiny 2.6mm beads, granting you the precision needed for complex melting beads designs. Once your masterpiece is ready, the included large ironing paper and four ironing sheets provide safe, even heat distribution to fuse the beads perfectly. Whether you're crafting bead pets or detailed iron beads artwork, these high-quality accessories ensure your designs hold their shape and display your creativity beautifully. ‚Ä∫ See more product details

So the variety is awesome. The board warps slightly when ironing but it‚Äôs still very usable afterwards. All my projects came out beautifully and they definitely are made to last.I really hope the seller makes it available to purchase one color of beads as I‚Äôm running out of black, white and dark green!Awesome product though, it‚Äôs truly helped put my hopes and dreams into reality, don‚Äôt think twice and buy it! Not only is it fun to do, but it‚Äôs awesome for concentration since the beads are so small and intricate. That said, definitely don‚Äôt buy the mini beads for kidsüòÇ they might eat them.
